name: lemon-js
description: Define your mongoose models easily with Typescript

scripts.tslint: node_modules/.bin/tslint -t verbose index.ts lib/*.ts lib/**/*.ts test/*.ts test/**/*.ts
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run publishtest
scripts.publishtest: npm run tslint && npm run mocha -- --no-timeouts
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run mocha
scripts.integration: npm run tslint && node_modules/.bin/mocha --no-timeouts --reporter mocha-circleci-reporter mocha -r ts-node/register test/init.ts test/*.spec.ts
scripts.debug: npm run tslint && npm run mocha -- --inspect --inspect-brk

author: Alexey Prokhorov & Jacob Zhang
